name: Lykaia
description:
Lykaia is an action game with a tower-defend gameplay concept where you play as a knight and a cowboy to protect a village by fighting hordes of werewolves.

=====

PLAY AS 2 CHARACTERS

A knight, who uses sword to cut through werewolves.

-----

A cowboy, who uses dual gun to shoot the werewolves from afar.

-----

Make use of both of them and create your own unique playstyle!

=====

2 AVAILABLE GAME MODES

STORY MODE

Two adventurers were stopping by a village when they heard a terrible news. People in the city were turning to werewolves at night. Men were clueless, women were worried, children were frightened. The village chief then asked those two adventurers for their help. They reluctantly accepted, as they find it hard to believe the news.

This is a short story about two heroes, and the beginning of an ominous mystery that threatens the world.

-----

ENDLESS MODE

If you're confident of your skill, test it here and fight an endless hordes of werewolves. Get the highest score possible and let us know in the comments!
